nodes.text: Bolt was a person who worked as a bartender at The Chasm, a cantina in Gadrin, on the planet Cularin. After the cantina was attacked by the Dark Jedi Raik Muun, the Kubaz Forg F'Lopo was caught up in the furor. Bolt said that F'Lopo could have some free drinks at the cantina the next day, to help get over it.
